Cheers ! There are no PEP8 issues in this Pull Request. :beers:

@jreback Thanks jreback, I edited files to reflect your comments. But I don't know why "all ci checks have failed".
@jreback I found ci error message about "from datetime import timezone". ImportError: cannot import name timezone in python 2.7. So, I edited "datetime(....., tzinfo=pytz.utc)"
